title.value: Laboratory Tests

description.value: The following laboratory studies should be considered for patients who will receive warfarin. These laboratory studies may also be indicated for patients on other medications for VTE prophylaxis if clinically indicated per clinician judgment.

textEquivalent.value: Complete blood count daily 1 time (routine)
Basic metabolic panel daily 1 time (routine)
Activated partial thromboplastin time daily 1 time (routine)
Complete International normalized ratio daily 1 time (routine)
